start_2: 📚 Welcome to the Book Marathon! 📚 Every day, mark how many pages you’ve read and move towards your goal! The bot will remind you to track your progress, and at the end of the month, it will summarize the results. 🔹 How does the marathon work? ✅ Register and log your reading every day. ✅ Get reminders if you forget to mark your progress. ✅ At the end of the month, the bot will allocate participants: those who read more will give a book to those who read less! Click "Register" to get started! 🚀
menu: 📌 Main Menu Choose an action from the list of available commands Click on the required command or type it manually. (You can always call the Menu by typing /menu)
lang: 🌍 Language Selection Please choose the language in which you would like to use the bot Click the appropriate button to change the language.
read: 📖 How many minutes have you read today? Please enter the number of minutes you dedicated to reading today. For example: 30
read_2: I didn’t understand you. Use the bot’s commands.
read_3: We have updated your statistics for today.
register: 🎉 Congratulations! 🎉 You have successfully registered! 🎊 Now you can enjoy all the features.
register_1: Sorry, you are not registered. Please complete the registration process to continue.
register_2: 📅 Set up your personal timer! ⏳ You can set a reminder for a time that works for you. Just select a time, and we will send you a notification exactly on time! 🔹 How to set the timer? Choose the time to send the message (e.g., 20:00).
lang_1: 🎉 Language successfully changed! The bot will now communicate with you in the selected language.
lang_2: ❌ Error changing language Failed to change the language. Please try again later.
timer: 🎉 Congratulations! You have successfully set the timer. The reminder will be sent on time. ⏰
timer_1: ⚠️ An error occurred! Failed to set the timer. Please try again or select a different time.
timer_2: ⏰ Reminder! Please enter the amount of time you read today. (Hint: You can use /read)
